name: Duck With A Gun ALPHA
description:
The Alpha stage of Duck With A Gun is finally out!

Expect a lot of updates and improvements before the full version is out, and please leave any feedback or bugs in the comments!

A few people were confused, so I'm just straight up telling you: Restart with enter. I don't have enough C3 events left for a restart menu, so just press enter (on death) to restart.

This is my first game, so don't think it'll be the best thing ever...
